text: Denis Granečný (born 7 September 1998) is a Czech professional footballer who plays as a defender for Dutch Eredivisie club FC Emmen, on loan from Baník Ostrava. He made his senior league debut for Baník Ostrava on 14 February 2016 in a Czech First League 0-3 loss at Mladá Boleslav. On 4 February 2020, Granečný joined Dynamo České Budějovice on a six-month loan deal. After making only one appearance for the club, he was loaned out again; this time a season- long loan to Dutch Eredivisie club FC Emmen on 13 August 2020. ==References== ==External links == * * Denis Granečný official international statistics Category:Czech footballers Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:Czech First League players Category:Eredivisie players Category:FC Baník Ostrava players Category:SK Dynamo České Budějovice players Category:FC Emmen players Category:Czech expatriate footballers Category:Czech expatriate sportspeople in the Netherlands Category:Expatriate footballers in the Netherlands
title: Denis Granečný
